title: Pole Shift Survival as of 7/16/2016
description:
The Pole Shift Survival Information Library at http://pssurvival.com/PS/ has held a great growing collection of information about how to rebuild society after a collapse.

A recent viewing of that link showed me that almost all of their front end is 404ing and I feared for the safety of the data.

However, everything is still archived and available here - http://www.pssurvival.com/PS/3-Updates/index.htm

This torrent is a complete download of that page as of 7/16/2016.

It's pretty huge (12.9 gigs all zipped up).

This is a mix of official and unofficial PDFs, images and text files. Most of it is really worthwhile. Some of it is "meh" and some really doesn't deserve to be saved, but I'm not sorting though all of that
